template.subject: Task Verification Request: %FROM_FIRSTNAME% %FROM_LASTNAME% Requests Verification of Completion of %TASK_TITLE%
template.body:
Dear %TO_FULLNAME%,
%FROM_FIRSTNAME% %FROM_LASTNAME% has asked that you verify that they successfully completed the task, %TASK_TITLE%.
Please click the link below to complete verification or decline to verify.
%TASK_VERIFICATION_URL%
Should you have any questions or concerns please contact %FROM_FIRSTNAME% %FROM_LASTNAME% directly.
Sincerely,
%APPLICATION_NAME%
